ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A complete API client for the image hosting service Imgur.com, including the an imgur graphics device, enabling the easy upload and sharing of plots.
A complete API client for the image hosting service Imgur.com, including the an imgur graphics device, enabling the easy upload and sharing of plots.

name: r-imgur
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0.3' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-imgur
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/imguR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/imguR/imguR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6311f971d9a2041250e45c81184d0408f220f37236e62016be7965c41e7cc791

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-httr
    - r-jpeg
    - r-png

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-httr
    - r-jpeg
    - r-png

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('imguR')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('imguR')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/leeper/imguR
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: A complete API client for the image hosting service Imgur.com, including the an imgur
    graphics device, enabling the easy upload and sharing of plots.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mxr-conda
    - rluria14
    - ndmaxar
    - RyanHackney
    - conda-forge/r
    - oblute

# The original CRAN metadata for this package was:

# Package: imguR

# Maintainer: Thomas J. Leeper <thosjleeper@gmail.com>
# Imports: httr, png, jpeg, tools
# Description: A complete API client for the image hosting service Imgur.com, including the an imgur graphics device, enabling the easy upload and sharing of plots.
# License: GPL-3
